column5: How do you like summer 2009 so far? I don't want to hear how the farmers needed the rain Anyway the fishing has been alright. Here's a quick pictorial review of July... There are some OFNer's hidden here if you look closely...grin. These are mostly, but not all, on Lower Buckhorn.                                         So that was July...let's see what August has to offer. Garry2rs
the majority of time in ponchos or long sleeves! Yup, that was July alright.  Nice fish though Garry!
Mine was actually the biggest fish. You just take out a lot of little bitty people.  JF
John, I saved your big fish for my August report, so you will have to wait until September to see it here...grin.
Well, I sure hope it ain't the biggest fish of the month. That would be disappointing for all proud Kawarthians.  JF
He also neglected to mention I got the biggest perch of the weekend.  JF
Nice bass there Garry. Thanks for sharing. Cant wait to see the August report. Geeze........is it August already?
Nice pics Garry.  I know what you mean about July....terrible weather especially on the weekends!  Hopefully August smartens up a bit.
Where are all the walleye pictures....
